item.description:
WINTER IN NEW ENGLAND AS A VEGAN LIVING FOODS ENTHUSIAST

This presentation is geared to the curious, the health seeker and all seasoned vegans and living foods enthusiasts.

Dorit is known for her very heart centered, unique style and approach to eating as a sacred art.

Participants will be surprised by the range and depth of ready to use information that will be given during this presentation.

This is not a regular how to living foods or vegan talk. The wealth of information and the ambiance created will last long after the evening is over, and sustain you into the coming chilly New England winter evenings.

This presentation will benefit anyone: vegan living foods enthusiast or average American eater who wishes to throw off the shackles of old conditioning and forge a new path into health and wellness from one's own unique perspective based on individual needs, likes and dislikes.

For further information please see Dorit's websites:
www.serenityspaces.org
www.greenlifestylefilmfestival.com

Video for a Vegan Living Foods Holiday Meal with Dorit:
www.youtube.com/watch?v=iX0iqZMwo8Q

Donation ticket $15 on line or $20 at the door.

Bring a raw vegan, organic, unprocessed dish for 8 people with the recipe and serving utensils marked with your name. For ideas of what to bring, click on the recipe section on the website, www.optimumhealthsolution.org. If you are unable to bring a dish, pay $10 extra for food and tell Betsy Bragg 617-835-2913

4:30 - Set-up
5:30 - Register and socialize
6:00 - 6:15 Stuart Reiter, Prana Cafe Chef, demo: Delicious Prana Torte
6:15 - 7:15 Living Organic Plant Food Potluck
7:15 - 8:45 Dorit lecture
8:45 - Q & A and book and DVD signing

Learn more here:
www.meetup.com/RawBoston/calendar/11360240/

Posted by Martha Muehe (www.essenic.com)
item.name: Dorit & Potluck
